north_star: To empower development teams by providing the necessary support, education, and tools to maximize productivity and innovation.
mission: To unblock, enable, and accelerate the development process by offering comprehensive support, training, and documentation to all engineering teams.
vision: To foster an environment where development teams can work efficiently, overcome obstacles quickly, and continuously improve their skills and processes.

core.description: Individuals or teams directly receiving support and enablement services.
core.value: Product Engineering Teams, Backend Development Teams, DevX Team

supportive.description: Individuals or teams that influence or support the Enablement team's initiatives.
supportive.value: CloudFoundation Team, Delivery Team, Observability Team

peripheral.description: External or less directly involved stakeholders who have an interest in the Enablement team's outcomes.
peripheral.value: InfoSec Team, FinOps Team, Operations Team, Business Leadership

kpis.objective: Reduce time to resolve development blockers.
kpis.justification: Faster resolution of blockers increases overall development speed and productivity.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to resolve support requests and unblock teams.
kpis.outbound: Monthly support performance reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Increase developer satisfaction with support services.
kpis.justification: Higher satisfaction correlates with improved productivity and morale.
kpis.measurement: Developer satisfaction scores from regular internal surveys.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly satisfaction reports to Engineering Leadership

kpis.objective: Enhance the quality and accessibility of documentation.
kpis.justification: Good documentation reduces the learning curve and helps developers solve problems independently.
kpis.measurement: Documentation usage metrics and developer feedback on documentation quality.
kpis.outbound: Bi-monthly documentation reports to Development Teams

kpis.objective: Increase the adoption of best practices and tools.
kpis.justification: Adopting best practices and tools improves the consistency and quality of development across teams.
kpis.measurement: Number of teams adopting recommended practices and tools.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly adoption reports to Engineering Leadership

kpis.objective: Improve collaboration between the Enablement team and core stakeholders.
kpis.justification: Better collaboration leads to more effective support and alignment with development needs.
kpis.measurement: Frequency and quality of collaboration meetings and joint initiatives.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly collaboration reports to all stakeholders
